profile.name: Koki Nakagawa
profile.role: Japan / Master's student of Information Systems / Engineer

selfIntro.title: Abstract
selfIntro.content:
A first-year master's student majoring in Information Systems at Toyama Prefectural University.
During junior high and high school, I played Splatoon for 5000 hours. I was a self-proclaimed 'useless person' who slept during class and played games until morning after getting home.
Disgusted with myself, I decided to change.
I entered graduate school in 2025 and plan to study abroad for a year in 2026 to realize my dreams.

bio.description: Graduated from Toyama Prefectural Takaoka Technical High School, Department of Electronic Machinery
Entered Toyama Prefectural University, Faculty of Engineering, Department of Information Systems Engineering
Appointed as DX Promotion Supporter at Toyama Prefectural Government
Assigned to Iwamoto-Kawasaki Laboratory (Social Information System Design Laboratory)
Graduated from Toyama Prefectural University, Faculty of Engineering, Department of Information Systems Engineering
Entered Toyama Prefectural University Graduate School, Master's Program in Electronics and Information Engineering
Planning to take a year off to study abroad in the Philippines and Canada

developmentSection.frontend: Frontend: Web application development using Next.js/TypeScript
developmentSection.design: Design: Simple UI design using Figma, styling with TailwindCSS and MUI
developmentSection.backend: Backend: Creating simple REST APIs using Python and Go, backend using open APIs
developmentSection.cloud: Cloud Services: Full-stack development using Azure and AWS
developmentSection.experience: I have created a Chrome extension that dubs overseas videos in real-time and a service for managing student organization projects like a game bulletin board. In my work, I have developed full-stack ToDo app teaching materials and a RAG system for referencing past budget requests in government using Azure
developmentSection.current: Currently, I'm not just focused on web app development. Inspired by the self-expression of artists and creators, I'm challenging myself in areas I once gave up on: game development, vlog creation (video shooting and editing), and mobile app development for my master's research.

snowboarding.description: There's nothing like riding down snowy mountains. I love powder snow and ground tricks

article.noteNotice: Articles are written in Japanese on the note platform.

aboutMe.skillsIntro: I have been mainly developing web applications since December 2022. Recently, I've been improving my cloud services, game development, and video editing skills
aboutMe.frontend: I mainly develop using Next.js. I've won hackathons three times and gained a lot of experience through internships and personal projects
aboutMe.backend: I can develop simple REST APIs and connect to databases using Go and TypeScript. I can also build simple applications using open APIs (e.g., Spotify Web API, grant APIs, Slack API, etc.)
aboutMe.general: Languages I've learned in university classes or on my own. Currently learning C# for game development
aboutMe.cloud: I have experience developing in cloud environments for government and university projects. Mainly responsible for deployment, function apps, databases, and AI services
aboutMe.design: I handle everything from design to styling using Figma. I use TailwindCSS and MUI for styling
aboutMe.dxPromotion: Tools I've used for automating and streamlining work at Toyama Prefectural Government
aboutMe.other: I use a wide range of tools for version control, project management, video/image editing, and game development
